        @Const
 @ByRef
public static Device getDefault()

      • fromHandle

        @ByVal
public static Device fromHandle(Pointer d)
        Parameters:
        d - OpenCL handle (cl_device_id). clRetainDevice() is called on success. \note Ownership of the passed device is passed to OpenCV on success. The caller should additionally call clRetainDevice on it if it intends to continue using the device.
